entry.title: "𝑨𝒏𝒅 𝒂𝒕 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒆𝒏𝒅 𝒐𝒇 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒅𝒂𝒚, 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒇𝒆𝒆𝒕 𝒔𝒉𝒐𝒖𝒍𝒅 𝒃𝒆 𝒅𝒊𝒓𝒕𝒚, 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒉𝒂𝒊𝒓 𝒎𝒆𝒔𝒔𝒚, 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒆𝒚𝒆𝒔 𝒔𝒑𝒂𝒓𝒌𝒍𝒊𝒏𝒈." Come and explore your next adventure at the Ballyhoura Mountain Bike Trails 🚴 nestled in the beautiful Ballyhoura mountains ⛰. Immerse yourself deep in the l
entry.content: "𝑨𝒏𝒅 𝒂𝒕 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒆𝒏𝒅 𝒐𝒇 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒅𝒂𝒚, 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒇𝒆𝒆𝒕 𝒔𝒉𝒐𝒖𝒍𝒅 𝒃𝒆 𝒅𝒊𝒓𝒕𝒚, 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒉𝒂𝒊𝒓 𝒎𝒆𝒔𝒔𝒚, 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒆𝒚𝒆𝒔 𝒔𝒑𝒂𝒓𝒌𝒍𝒊𝒏𝒈." Come and explore your next adventure at the Ballyhoura Mountain Bike Trails 🚴 nestled in the beautiful Ballyhoura mountains ⛰. Immerse yourself deep in the lush forest alive with native wildlife. 98km of flowy trails including forest road climbs, tight twisty singletrack with a rollercoaster of ups and downs and a boardwalk is guaranteed to leave you smiling. The trails range from the moderate 6km Greenwood loop to the demanding Castlepook loop, over 50km in length! Take on the trails at a speed suited to your current skillset. Park your car, rent a bike from @ballyhouratrailriders and off you go! After your adrenaline-fueled adventure, you can sate your appetite at the nearby @spruce_and_willow Café in Ardpatrick. #VisitBallyhoura #DiscoverIreland #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #AdventureIsland #keepdiscovering #adventuretourism #loveireland #mtb #mtblife #mtbtrails

entry.title: Another wonderful day at the official reopening of Doneraile Court last week. The 5th most visited free attraction, Doneraile Court and Gardens is located in the North Cork area of Ballyhoura Country and it’s one of the Ireland’s most popular hidden gems
entry.content: Another wonderful day at the official reopening of Doneraile Court last week. The 5th most visited free attraction, Doneraile Court and Gardens is located in the North Cork area of Ballyhoura Country and it’s one of the Ireland’s most popular hidden gems 💎. The €2m refurbishment of the Doneraile Court by @opwireland opened up the second floor to the public. It is now open 5 days a week until mid June and guided tours are available from 10am to 4pm Wednesday to Sunday and Bank holidays. It will be open 7 days a week from mid June 🙌✨ #heritageireland #OPW #visitdoneraile #visitballyhoura #castletownhouse #irelandshiddenheartlands #ballyhoura #munstervales #purecork #guidesofireland #visitcork @Munster Vales @Pure Cork @Ireland’s Hidden Heartlands @

entry.title: 🌿 Discover the Wonders of Ballyhoura Nature Trail! 🌳 Watch our delightful video to get a sneak peek into the wonders that await you. The nature trail is perfect for a family activity outdoors - enjoy nature, encounter playful wildlife, and create memories
entry.content: 🌿 Discover the Wonders of Ballyhoura Nature Trail! 🌳 Watch our delightful video to get a sneak peek into the wonders that await you. The nature trail is perfect for a family activity outdoors - enjoy nature, encounter playful wildlife, and create memories that will last a lifetime. 🐿️📸 Trail Information: 🚩 Length: 2 kilometres 🕒 Duration: 40min 👪 Family-friendly: Yes! Suitable for all ages and fitness levels 🐾 Pet-friendly: Feel free to bring your furry friends on a leash 🍽️ Picnic Areas: take a rest at the Ballyhoura Trails Head 🚻 Facilities: Toilets available at Ballyhoura Trails Head 🚗 Parking Fee: €5.00 per car. A contactless payment system is in operation Learn more and download the nature trail map on our website: 👉 https://visitballyhoura.com/explore/ballyhoura-nature-trail #BallyhouraNatureTrail #FamilyAdventure #NatureLoversUnite #ExploreNature #BreathtakingViews #GetOutdoors #NatureTherapy #MakingMemories #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #FamilyFriendly #DiscoverTheWilderness #KeepDiscovering #MunsterVales #LimerickEdgeEmbrace @munstervales @limerick.ie @irelandshiddenheartlands @discoverireland.ie
